name: fullstackopen_round3
description: Round 3 of the course Fullstack open 2019

scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q build && cd ../FullStackOpen2019/osa2/puhelinluettelo && npm run build && xcopy /E build "../../../FullStackOpen_round3/build" /i
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
